snippet.title: Dreamland Farm | Release Trailer | Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Since childhood you’ve dreamed of being close to nature but being born and raised in a busy city stood in the way of that. The closer you were to adulthood the more time you’ve spent with your grandma, who showed you all around her own farm. From crops to berries and mushrooms – everything she knew she taught you. She prepared you to be her successor!

Now you can step into those shoes and start your independent life in Dreamland Farm! Make the most of what you have, farmer.

Available now on the Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/dreamland-farm-switch/?srsltid=AfmBOoqLUjaGfkepbC04DpcF-I5szG_SEcn2YDATRMZ85UT808_GBCQa

Don't forget to follow us on 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RedDeer_Games
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RedDeerGames
and Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/reddeer_games/
